name: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando International Drive North

reviews.text: We booked 2 rooms at this hotel for the weekend. I am very happy to say that we had no problems what so ever. Overall the hotel is clean and nicely deocorated. We didnt use any of the ammenities since we just went up to Orlando to go to Disney. But we did see they have a business center and a gym. We know they have a pool and Tiki bar, but again we didnt look into it since we werent going to use it.
reviews.title: Great Hotel! Great Location! Clean, Convieniet and Delicious Breakfast

likes.liked: — The Hotel was Clean, Convienient Location and great Breakfast.

reviews.text: The hotel is about a mile or two off of I-4 so it is easy to get to and to get to. It is convienient if you have your own car. I dont know what if any shuttle services they have since we did not ask about it. I have to say check in was great the staff was nice and helpful. We asked for driving directions and they gave us a accurtate print out of driving directions to each major theme park and attraction. they had the rolling carts for your luggage and two elevators. Our rooms were very clean and had everything we needed. Fridge and Microwave and two double beds. A/C worked very well. We booked the bed and breakfast package and it was awesome. For breakfast they have bacon, sausage, fruits, bagels, toast, cereal, yogurt, different types of milk, fresh orange juice coffee, teas, they had fresh cooked to order french toast, omlets, waffle maker with fruit toppings, muffins, pastries, oatmeal, grits in all it was a complete breakfast with all you can think of. (I know how important that breakfast is when you are going to the park for the day and you want to eat well before you go) The lobby was decorated really nicely for the holidays. In all we definately recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Quite possibly the best Hilton I've stayed at in a while

likes.liked: — The location, the friendly staff, the accommodations

reviews.text: I've stayed at a couple of Hilton chain hotels in the past and none of them had really impress me. The Garden Inn, however, is a of a different breed.
reviews.title: One of the best budget hotels on IDrive

likes.liked: — Free wi-fi internet access, free printing. Comfortable bed, Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My 7-night stay in a double standard guest room was strictly for business. The location of this hotel is isolated from the main strip, so it is very quiet at night, allowing for a good night's sleep. Check-in was a breeze. My roommate and I were able to check-in individually without having to wait for the credit card holder of our company to check everybody in as a group. Bethzaida, who assisted us with our check-in is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando International Drive North Hotel
description: Welcome to the Hilton Garden Inn Orlando International Drive North hotel. Our hotel is five minutes from Universal Orlando Resort®, and twenty minutes from Walt Disney World®. Make the most of your time here thanks to the complimentary scheduled shuttle service to and from Universal Orlando® theme parks, SeaWorld Orlando®, and Wet 'N Wild®. Situated off Interstate 4, this International Drive hotel is within walking distance or a short drive to shops and restaurants. Orlando International Airport (MCO) is just 20 minutes away.Stay in the loop during your visit to Orlando with complimentary high-speed internet access in all guest rooms and public areas. Enjoy a variety of complimentary services at this Orlando hotel including a 24-hour Business Center, fitness center and swimming pool. Relax poolside with your favorite beverage from Tiki bar or indulge in hearty cuisine at the Great American Grill®. For meetings and events, the hotel offers a range of meeting rooms with audio/visual equipment and an excellent catering menu.Unwind after a day of business or fun and adventure in Orlando in one of the hotel’s comfortable guest rooms or suites. All rooms feature a hospitality center with a microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker for your convenience. Relax with a movie on the flat screen television or contact family and friends back home with complimentary high-speed internet access.Rejuvenate at this Orlando hotel by plunging into the outdoor pool or enjoy an invigorating workout at the fitness center. For a delicious meal, the Great American Grill® restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner every day. Meet up with friends for pre-dinner cocktails at Tiki Bar or catch up with work at the 24-hour Business Center. The Pavilion Pantry® is open 24 hours a day, serving a selection of beverages, snacks, and microwave dinners to enjoy in your guest room or suite. Host a business meeting, function or wedding at the hotel and enjoy delicious cuisine in relaxed surroundings.
